title: Donald Trump didn't say that the feet with PTSD were weak.
subtitle: The Republican candidate Donald Trump did not say that ex-combatants suffering from PTSD are "vulnerable" and "inappropriate" and "can't handle" military service.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Donald Trump said that ex-combatants suffering from PTSD are "vulnerable" and "inappropriate" and "can't handle" military service.
